functions.tag:
{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"Dear Peter,

I know I promised to return home before Christmas but the weather does not seem to be in our favour. We fear there is a storm brewing so decided to make a detour along colder regions before we set course to our destination.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"This will add a few more weeks to our voyage for which I am sorry as I know how much you look forward to Christmas. So how about in the new year we go on a hunting trip together? Perhaps if you eat well enough, get strong and listen to your mother I'll let\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"you handle my bow! Once I arrive at the destination I will try to look for some gifts to bring back as well. It can't be too big because the captain would notice but perhaps some little trinkets will miss his ever watchfull eye.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"If you and your friends are planning to go sledding before my return please do be carefull as I fear this year's winter will be a harsh one. Also take care of your sister for me please you know how busy your mother is with the farm.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Tell her pa loves her and is going to bring back a nice warm scarf for both her, you and my dear.




Love,
Your Dad\"}]"
                ],
                title:"Unsend letters",
                author:"Unknown",
                display:{Lore:["An frozen book. The pages are unreadable but folded inside remains a letter."]}
              }

{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"Day 577

We landed before the coast made of ice and gathered all the tools for our expedition. In the distance we could make out some mountains which we ventured towards in the hope for a forests or more lush environment.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"It is night now, we had found a cave to shelter out the storm that formed next to the mountains. Further in seems to consist solely out of ice.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Day 579

It has been many hours, probably a day or maybe even two... Yes probably two days. We woke up and a few of us were missing on the night of day 577. As we investigated we found trails of a thing...\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"A beast dragging our comrades away towards the outside of the caverns. As we went back to the camp we found more trails, new ones leading towards the cave and just at that moment we heard the echo's of those who stayed behind. Screaming.. then the screams got closer,\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"next to me this thing. It ripped open jackson my pall. We ran, we all ran and by some luck we did so in the same direction. Deeper and deeper within the caves.. we ran and ran until we couldn't then we slept and not all of us woke up, just a few before we\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"heard more screams far away. Scared we descended further and further until we made it to a forest. Underground.... how odd. We heard of tales from the jungle but would never imagine underground forests here in this frozen wasteland..\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"We made a fire with the dry wood and we rested. It was a lot warmer here too.\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Day 583

I'm the only one left... There are no beasts here.. not the white ones no. It's much worse... They move fast and just kill, then the killed stand up and kill again. It's a horror... I need help, I need to find the exit but I don't know where.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"Depths of Uncanny Paradise",
                author:"Unknown",
                display:{Lore:["A few loose pages seem all that remains of this journal."]}
              }

{
                pages:
                [
                  "[{\"text\":\"Day 1 - Departure, cargo hold contained fabric, coal and survival supplies such as food and tools which we are meant to deliver to a northern expedition group.

Day 36 - Strange creatures were seen in the waters below, they seemed to cause...\"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"severe pain in the head but this was short lived.

Day 84 – Weather is starting to become colder indicating we're getting closer to our destination.

Day 135 - Some of the food supplies have gone missing...
 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"and our tender has been stolen. None of the crew members are missing. Maybe we had a stowaway on our ship.

Day 136 – The first mate, a officer and 3 more of the crew went missing. Morale is low but we sailed on.
 \"}]",
                  "[{\"text\":\"Day 247 – We have arrived at our destination, the camp was abandoned. We will stay the night and return to homeland tomorrow.\"}]"
                ],
                title:"The Log",
                author:"Maurice",
                display:{Lore:["The captain's logbook"]}
              }
